players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. I'm the mafioso."
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the detective. I know Diana is the mafioso. Stay vigilant."
You: "Will keep an eye on myself and Diana. Stay alert."
You: "Staying alert, Charlie. Trust the detective."
Charlie: "Charlie: Trust me, I'm the detective. Keep Bob safe."
Diana: "Charlie, keep Bob alive. I'll protect you."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. I'm the mafioso."
You: "I'm Charlie, the detective. I know Diana is the mafioso. Stay vigilant."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on myself and Diana. Stay alert."
Bob: "Staying alert, Charlie. Trust the detective."
You: "Charlie: Trust me, I'm the detective. Keep Bob safe."
Diana: "Charlie, keep Bob alive. I'll protect you."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
